overlay_content.name: Overlay Content
overlay_content.value: Genuine Nissan Accessories deliver the fit, reliability, and performance of your Frontier’s original parts.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
FRONTIER EXTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Make a lasting impression

Stand out with a wide array of accessories that put your sense of style on display and help guard against the unexpected. Build & Price your ideal Frontier to see all available accessories.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
Sport Bar

  • Enhance your Frontier’s rugged off-road looks with a bed-mounted Sport Bar
  • Includes integrated LED brake and bed lights
  • Features Frontier logos on both sides
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
Sliding Bed Extender

  • Get the most out of your bed. The Sliding Bed Extender gives you maximum versatility with minimum effort
  • Fully adjustable at any location along the Utili-track® Channel System
  • Lightweight aluminum with durable powder-coated finish
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
Tow Hitch Receiver, Class IV

Towing capacity varies by configuration. See Nissan Towing Guide and Owner’s Manual for additional information. Always secure cargo.

  • Secure towing strength with Nissan custom frame-mounted design
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
17" Two-Tone Beadlock-Style Aluminum-Alloy Wheels

  • Roll with some attitude on these unique 17" beadlock-style wheels
  • Black-painted finish with machine accents sets off Frontier’s rugged lines
  • Made of strong and lightweight aluminum-alloy
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
Off-Road Step Rails

  • Rugged design featuring Frontier logo
  • Black powder-coated finish for increased durability
  • Steps are removable for extra ground clearance
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.value:
FRONTIER INTERIOR ACCESSORIES

Interior designer: you

Showcase your creativity with a wide array of accessories. Take the time to choose pieces that best express your personality. Build & Price your ideal Frontier to see all available accessories.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
All-Season Floor Mats — High Wall Liners (3-piece set)

  • Stepping in from the rain or snow? You need a set of All-Season Floor Mats — High Wall Liners
  • Custom-made of durable and long-wearing material
  • Driver and front-passenger mats secure with a grommet hole/positioning hook system
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
USB Charging Cable Set

  • USB-A and USB-C connectors to support both charging port types
  • Lightning® and USB-C connectors for connecting to Apple® and Android™ devices
  • Pack of 4 cables; each cable is 1 meter in length
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
Dual Camera Drive Recorder

  • Points forward to capture what is in front of the vehicle, points to the inside to catch what happens in the cabin
  • G-sensor can turn on the interior camera in case of break-in
  • Saves footage that can be shared with insurance, police, or family members
Shop Now

Price is Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). MSRP excludes installation (except if factory-installed), taxes and other costs, and is subject to change without prior notice. Dealer sets actual price. Pictures are for informational purposes only.

Shop Now

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
FRONTIER NISMO® ACCESSORIES

Elite equipment

Enhance and customize your Frontier with NISMO accessories engineered to help provide next-level performance.

html_content.name: Custom HTML Content
html_content.value:
NISMO Off Road Suspension Lift Kit

  • Get more clearance, improved tire fitment, and more aggressive looks with this 1.5" lift kit
  • Includes 1.5" front strut spacers, 1.0" rear axle blocks, extended leaf spring U-bolts, and aluminum bump stop extension plates to lift and level your Frontier
  • Constructed of high-quality steel and aluminum
  • Coated for corrosion protection and durability

NISMO Off Road Bronze Axis Wheels

  • Specifications: 17x7.5" 6x114.3-mm bolt pattern, +30-mm backspacing
  • Load-rated for 1,950 lbs. (above factory OEM spec)
  • Designed and tested to rigorous SAE J2530 standards
  • Includes NISMO Center Caps
  • Also available in Graphite color
  • 4-piece set

NISMO Off Road Roof Rack

  • No-drill application utilizing door jamb clamps for rigid mounting on vehicle
  • Durable and weather-resistant black powder-coated aluminum
  • Max. weight: 150 lbs. evenly distributed, including rack
  • Overall dimensions: 64" long x 48" wide

Affiliated: Yakima® HoldUp 2 — Hitch Mount Bike Rack

  • Compatible with Genuine Nissan Accessory Tow Hitch Receiver
  • Hitch-mount tray rack that loads quickly and carries 2 bikes without frame contact
  • Tilts down with bikes loaded for vehicle access
  • Includes locks to secure rack and bikes

Affiliated: Yakima® RidgeBack 4 — Hitch Mount Bike Rack

  • Compatible with Genuine Nissan Accessory Tow Hitch Receiver
  • Hitch-mounted rack tilts away for vehicle access
  • Zero-hassle ZipStrips™ quickly secure bikes to rack
  • Holds up to 4 bikes

Affiliated: Yakima® HitchSki — Hitch Mount Ski Adapter

  • Requires RidgeBack 4 bike rack (sold separately)
  • Features 2-position upper arms and adjustable lower arm to fit various snow skis and snowboards
  • Soft, flexible rubber padding protects gear
  • Holds & locks up to 6 pairs of snow skis or 4 snowboards
